name: R0B0TS
description:
Description:

Help the little Robots get to their Recharge Stations! Each Robot has a different style of movement so you must help the robots work together to reach all their stations:

  • Blue: Can move in the right direction.
  • Pink: Can move in the left direction.
  • Bounce-0: Can Jump.

Controls:

  • Mouse to hover over Robots
  • Left Mouse Click to Activate Robot
  • A,D or  Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move Left and Right
  • W, Space or Up Arrow to Jump
  • P to Pause Game

Credits:

  • UI Art: https://idlandgames.itch.io/ui-pixelart-assets-4
  • Music: https://daniconshow.itch.io/8bit-music-pack
  • Level Art: https://matwek.itch.io/colourful-platformer-industrial-tileset
  • Font: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold
  • Character Art: https://grafxkid.itch.io/
